Description:
Detects the use of "ioreg" which will show I/O Kit registry information.
This process is used for system information discovery.
It has been observed in-the-wild by calling this process directly or using bash and grep to look for specific strings.


Author: Joseliyo Sanchez, @Joseliyo_Jstnk
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: System Information Discovery Using Ioreg
Query: sourcetype like 'macos-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%-l%' or command like '%-c%') and (command like '%appleahcidiskdriver%' or command like '%ioplatformexpertdevice%' or command like '%oracle%' or command like '%parallels%' or command like '%usb vendor name%' or command like '%virtualbox%' or command like '%vmware%') and (process_path like '%/ioreg' and command like '%ioreg%'))
